reviewText:
I should have read the review first before ordering, It's so important and helpful before making the decision.
There was only one Christmas song from this DVD,Bing Crosby White Christmas, the rest of the songs was before my time, the picture clarity was poor, I didn't watch it all. I don't recommend this DVD.
When you order this movie check carefully. This is not Bing Crosby's "White Christmas" the movie; it is a USO show. It has talented actors and singers, but it is not the movie.
